description:
Welcome to Yazio, the most effective calorie counter, food tracker and intermittent fasting app for losing weight without dieting!
• Rated 4.6 stars based on 300,000+ reviews
• Trusted by 100M+ people
• App of the Day in the App Store
Track calories, eat better and reach your goals with Yazio’s free calorie counter app.
Whether you're working towards a calorie deficit, want to track your meals or just need a smart food tracker, Yazio is your all-in-one solution. Designed to support sustainable weight loss, muscle gain or weight maintenance, Yazio offers a science-backed approach to calorie counting that delivers long-term success without extreme diets.
• Easy-to-use calorie counter and food tracker
• Calorie deficit tracker to reach your weight goals
• Huge database with 95% of all food items
• Smart calorie tracker with barcode scanner
• Meal planning, food tracker and personalised recipes
• Integrated step and activity tracking
• Water tracker with reminders
• Instant access with no sign-up required
• Nutrition tools for men and women
• Regular updates with new calorie counter and calorie tracker features
• Support for healthy muscle building and weight gain
• Focus on long-term results, not yo-yo dieting
Yazio supports your progress with 3 powerful tools:
Calorie counter
• Free and intuitive calorie tracker
• Food diary with customisable calorie counter goals
• Tracking for calories, macros and nutritional values
• Food database with over 4 million searchable items
• Barcode scanner for easy calorie tracking
• Food ratings to support healthier choices
• Custom meals and meal planning tools linked to your calorie tracker
• Smart, simple calorie counting
• Integrated tracking for steps, workouts and symptoms
• Water tracker with reminders
• Visual calorie counter analysis and calorie tracker history
• Tips and tricks for efficient calorie tracking
Healthy habits & intermittent fasting
• Optional fasting tracker for various calorie tracker plans
• Regular meal timing and eating reminders
• Flexible plans, including 16:8 and 5:2
• Helpful guidance on ketosis, autophagy and energy use
• Seamless integration with your calorie counter, calorie tracker and food tracker
• Detailed nutrition insights based on calorie tracker and food tracker data
Recipes & meal planning
• 2,900+ delicious, goal-friendly recipes
• Weekly updates with new healthy meal ideas
• Filters for low-carb, vegetarian and vegan options
• Wide variety of meals including pizza, salads, desserts and more
• Smart grocery list for quick, easy shopping
• Step-by-step cooking mode for stress-free meal prep
Want faster results? Go Pro.
Try Yazio Pro to get advanced features that accelerate your progress.
• Unlock advanced calorie tracker tools
• See faster results with your custom food tracker plan
• Access in-depth food and calorie analysis
• Use advanced calorie deficit tracker and calorie counter tools
• Get custom meal plans tailored to your goals
• Sync with Fitbit, Garmin and more
• Track your mood, symptoms and body metrics over time
• Review progress with long-term trend insights
• Enjoy an ad-free experience for better focus
• Get the ultimate calorie counter experience
• Help support the Yazio team
Upgrade to Pro in the Yazio Calorie Counter App to unlock advanced features and insights. Pro is available as a subscription via in-app purchase and offers better value than other apps with calorie counters, calorie trackers, food trackers or intermittent fasting features.
• App help: http://help.yazio.com
• About our team: https://www.yazio.com/en/about-us
Unlock the ultimate food tracker, calorie counter and healthy eating experience with Yazio!
Help us make the Yazio Calorie Counter App even better as your go-to calorie counter, food tracker and weight loss tool. Have ideas or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!
With SportMate, you can explore what events are available to you! You can even join them to try your skills in a competitive environment.

Take control of your health – smarter, simpler, and more personal.

Vitaria helps you understand your body better with intelligent insights, AI Doctor Advice, and seamless HealthKit integration — all built with SwiftUI for a modern, smooth experience.

No more messy spreadsheets or disconnected trackers. Every health detail — from blood pressure to hydration — now lives in one secure, easy-to-use space designed with care.

What makes Vitaria different
- AI Doctor Advice – Receive personalized health insights powered by AI to better understand your daily trends and habits.
- HealthKit Integration – Sync your data automatically with Apple Health for a seamless experience across your devices.
- SwiftUI Experience – Enjoy a beautifully designed, fast, and accessible app built natively for iOS.
- Smart & Unified Tracking – Log blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, water intake, and medications — all in one app.
- Intelligent Insights – Visual trends, charts, and AI summaries help you see the bigger picture of your health journey.
- Reminders & Notes – Stay consistent with medication and hydration reminders, plus space for personal notes and observations.

Why users love Vitaria
- Simple, clean design that makes health tracking effortless.
- Secure storage — your health data always belongs to you.
- Developed independently, with no third-party templates or clones.
- Regular updates with new insights and features for your well-being.

Privacy & Responsibility

Vitaria is designed as a wellness companion, not a medical device.
It does not diagnose or treat medical conditions.
For any health concerns, always consult your healthcare professional.

Your data stays private — stored securely on your device and synced safely via HealthKit when enabled.
We never share personal information without your consent.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/vitaria-healthcare/privacy-policy

Build better habits with Vitaria – your health, your data, your insight.

Customizable workout plans and step-by-step recipes to help you achieve your goals – whether at home or in the gym!
The Real Body app offers expert support for every step of your progress. We guarantee motivation, a healthy lifestyle, and real results!

Five reasons to download Real Body:
1.	Personalized Workout and Meal Plans
Customized programs for weight loss, muscle building, or maintaining your fitness – all while enjoying life and avoiding burnout.
2.	Adapted to All Fitness Levels
Whether you’re a complete beginner or an advanced athlete, you’ll find the most suitable workout plan for your needs. Choose from home or gym programs – with or without equipment – and move at your own pace!
3.	Variety of Workout Styles
From strength training to cardio, from yoga to HIIT programs, we’ve got everything. Find your favorite to energize your day or help you relax after a long one.
4.	Easy-to-Follow Meal Plans
Enjoy nutritionist-curated, easy-to-make recipes, including #nemethdorottyafood, all designed to match your lifestyle.

App Features:
•	Personalized Workout Plans – We help you achieve results faster!
•	Macro- and Ingredient-Based Recipes with a Shopping List.
•	Recipe Library – Healthy recipes for all lifestyles, with quick and delicious options.
•	Community and Motivation – Join other users, share your successes, and find daily inspiration!
•	Yoga Programs – For full-body and mental harmony.

Make Real Body your new fitness partner!
“It really feels like having a coach right next to me.”

Privacy Policy: http://support.noextraining.com/en/articles/5133928-

bloater helps you achieve a leaner, more defined face with AI-powered analysis and expert-guided debloating exercises. Using cutting-edge facial scanning technology, the app detects signs of water retention, facial swelling, and bloating—showing you exactly why your face looks puffy. Over 100,000 people have already experienced a transformation with our carefully crafted routines. Take control of your facial appearance today and experience the power of bloater!

HOW TO USE bloater:

1) Upload a photo of your face and answer a few questions
2) Access your bloating analysis and improvement routine
3) Discover personalized insights with your custom debloating routine
4) Scan food for bloating potential

SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED:
* AI-powered bloating face analysis
* Food bloating analysis
* Personalized debloating routines
* Daily checklist
* Analysis statistics
* Detailed insights
* Custom debloating routine
* Tracking micronutrients
* Bloat forecast
* Water tracking

NOTE: We do not offer health or medical advice. Any and all face analysis, measurements, and recommendations should be viewed as suggestions for entertainment and self-discovery purposes only. Please consult with dermatology professionals for any medical or health concerns. All recommendations and suggestions are intended for informational purposes only.

Please consult a qualified health professional for personalized guidance and support.

Debloating routine recommendations are for entertainment and informational purposes only. Always consult with healthcare providers before making any changes to your health & skin care routine.

Partnerajánlatok - csak a BENU App-ban! Állandó kedvezmények és időszakos kuponajánlatok várják partnereink kínálatából különböző kategóriákban: Elektronika, Sport, Szabadidő, Divat, Egészség, Optika  
Előzetes értesítések - Már a megjelenés előtt hozzáférhet a következő havi akciós újsághoz, így elsőként értesülhet a legújabb ajánlatokról és újdonságokról.

Discover Macadam, the revolutionary application that turns physical activity into real money. Whether you're taking a leisurely stroll or in the middle of a running workout, every step you take is converted into pounds.  

Macadam is compatible with connected watches and uses your phone's step counter via Apple Health to track every step you take, every calorie you burn and every metre you walk. Looking for extra motivation to reach your fitness or weight loss goals? Then you've found it.

With Macadam, you're not just active, you're rewarded. Every step earns you 'coins', our virtual currency, which you can convert into real money and spend with our partners or transfer directly to your bank account. Put on your trainers, synchronise your connected watch and get started - every step counts, every step pays.

Fight the sedentary lifestyle with Macadam. By encouraging and rewarding physical activity, we help you stay fit all while increase your income. Whether you're walking or sprinting, the important thing is to get moving and start earning.

Your privacy is our priority. Macadam does not use your GPS data and will have no impact on your battery life. What's more, all data is anonymous - we will never sell your information.

Any questions? Consult our FAQ section to find answers to all your questions about our application.

Macadam is not affiliated with any other "walk to earn" application. We are a single entity, dedicated to rewarding your physical activity.

Grab your trainers, hit the track or the trails and start turning your steps into cash with Macadam, the step counter that rewards you. Are you walking? We'll reward it! Download Macadam today and start earning money while you stay active.

*** APP OF THE DAY IN THE UK ***
*** EDITOR'S CHOICE BY APPLE ***

Foodvisor is the last Health & Nutrition App you’ll need, providing you with a personalized nutrition plan made by experts just for you. Making healthier choices doesn’t have to be hard. Seize the opportunity to unlock your nutrition goals effortlessly with Foodvisor, your personalized nutritionist right in your back pocket.

Why Choose Foodvisor? 
We understand that navigating your health and wellness amidst a hectic schedule can be a daunting task. Foodvisor is here to make this journey easy and enjoyable. Foodvisor acts as a personal nutritionist who helps you make healthier food choices, monitor your daily intake, and reach your health goals sustainably.

Unmatched Features:
• Calorie Tracker: Easily track your calories with our Instant Food Recognition Camera. Snap a photo or scan a barcode, and Foodvisor instantly provides detailed nutritional information to help you maintain a balanced diet.
• Personalized Nutrition Plan: You are unique and so is your plan. Based on your profile and needs, our nutritionists will create the perfect plan for you to achieve your goals.
• Tailored Recipes: Say goodbye to bland weight-loss recipes. Our recipe suggestions are curated by nutrition experts, ensuring that you never compromise taste for health.
• Track Your Progress: Foodvisor’s user-friendly dashboard helps you monitor your progress over time. Set your goals, and Foodvisor will guide you every step of the way. You can track your calories, macros, weight, activities, water, and more.
• Custom Fitness Program: Based on your goals and fitness preferences, follow workout videos that can be easily integrated into your daily schedule.
• In-Depth Analysis: Understanding what you eat is key to success. Delve into detailed graphs and statistics to understand the nutrients you consume. Knowledge is power, and Foodvisor empowers you to make informed decisions.

Foodvisor is also integrated with Apple Health, so you can input your daily activities seamlessly into the app and track everything in one place.

Benefit Your Health & Wellness Journey
When it comes to managing your diet and losing weight, Foodvisor is a game-changer. With its innovative features, it doesn't merely track your food; it transforms the way you perceive nutrition. From fitness enthusiasts to individuals seeking to make healthier choices, Foodvisor is an invaluable tool. 

Take the Leap Today
Don’t just take our word for it. Download Foodvisor and experience a revolution in nutritional tracking and guidance. Let Foodvisor be the support and inspiration you need to achieve your health and wellness goals.

Foodvisor is free to download. To unlock the full power & purpose of the app (personalized nutrition plans, courses, fitness plan and recipes), subscribe to the Premium version. You will be charged through your iTunes account if you choose a Foodvisor membership in the app.

For auto-renewing membership plans, your iTunes account will be charged at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, at the previously selected rate. Your payment will continue to renew unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours prior to your next renewal date. Your membership can be managed or canceled in your Apple ID Account Settings. The auto-renewing membership plan is billed monthly.

Terms of services: www.foodvisor.io/terms
Privacy Policy: https://foodvisor.io/privacy

The brand new "HUAWEI Health: Europe" app has been launched to bring the "HUAWEI Health+" membership features to all users across Europe, such as "Workouts", "Yoga", "Mindful Meditation", and "Sleep Music".

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

--------------------
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

--------------------

Useful BMI Calculator: Health Tracker - check your ideal weight exactly
Looking for a user-friendly app to track your weight and Body Mass Index (BMI)? Our BMI Calculator app is quick and convenient to use, motivate you to take steps to improve your health effectively.

Why choose BMI Calculator: Health Tracker App?

1. BMI score
2. BMI history
3. Healthy weight range
4. Input height and weight easily
5. Weight Tracker
6. For everyone! Adults, teens and children

3+ Key features of BMI Calculator: Health Tracker

* Smart BMI Calculator

Whether you're an adult, adolescent or even a child, our calculator provides accurate BMI results. BMI Calculator app quickly calculate your BMI by entering your height and weight. So you can understand whether you're underweight, normal, overweight or obese.

* Track Your Weight History

BMI Calculator: Health Tracker will record your weight daily to track weight gain/loss easily. Analyze your diary and adjust your weight plan more effectively.

* Detailed body data chart

The BMI weight history graph feature allows you to see your weight fluctuations over time. Choose any weekly, monthly or yearly chart to get an overview and adjust your weight accordingly.

Download BMI Calculator: Health Tracker to have a better and healthier body!

Get workout and meal plans supported by human coaches, track your progress, and get bite-sized cognitive therapy tips to change your mindset.

FIVE REASONS TO INSTALL BetterMe:

1. Plan tailored to your goals

Whether your aim is to lose weight, build muscle, or stay fit, we’ve got just the solution for you. Transform your body with a workout and meal plan that fits your busy schedule, preferences and lifestyle.

2. Stay on top of your wellbeing

From activity and calories to water intake and fasting, our trackers help you build new healthy habits. While in-depth stats over time help make them a part of your routine and show your progress!

3. 1-on-1 coaching 

Want to boost your results? Upgrade to 1-on-1 coaching to get support and daily check-ins from your personal coach. Stay accountable and on track to achieve lasting results with expert guidance every step of the way. Need to tweak your workout plan, get nutrition tips, or a dose of motivation? Just drop them a line—your coach has got your back!

4. Challenges for every goal

Push yourself with guided challenges in workouts, nutrition, and mindset. Whatever goal you have in mind, you'll get a structured plan that keeps you on track and delivers real results!

5. Start with your mind 

We believe that happiness starts from the inside out. Explore our chapters on nurturing a positive mindset. Just 10 minutes a day to rewire your negative thinking and set you up for success.

6. Get a 360° view of your wellness

Gain a better insight into your wellness journey with the BetterMe Fitness Tracker and Smart Scale. Monitor your sleep quality, daily steps, heart rate, and body composition to understand how your habits impact your overall well-being.

BetterMe is your go-to app for various workout types, easy-to-follow meal plans, and useful tips! 

Here’s how we help you succeed: 
Workout Plan: Get ready to get in better shape with short and effective workouts.
Delicious Meal Plans: Enjoy mouth-watering dishes chosen just for you! Our easy video recipes make cooking a breeze.
Intuitive Calorie Tracker: Keep tabs on your daily calorie and macros intake.
Personal Coach Feature: You’re never alone on this journey! You can upgrade to get professional guidance and support every step of the way.
Water and Step Trackers: Stay on top of your daily goals and keep your hydration and activity levels in check!
Workouts for Everyone: Whether you love yoga, running, or walking, we have over 4 000 workouts that fit your style and fitness level!

BetterMe app is also integrated with the Apple Health app, so that you can track your steps inside the actual app as well as log your water and calorie intake. You can see your workout and meal schedule on the main screen and set workout notifications so that we can remind you to work out at a suitable time.

We offer flexible subscription plans, so you can choose what suits you best. Please note that subscriptions automatically renew within 24 hours before the end of the free trial or the current subscription period. You can manage or cancel your subscription anytime through your Apple ID settings. If a free trial is available, any unused portion will be forfeited upon purchasing a subscription.
 
Terms of Use - https://betterme.world/terms 
Privacy Policy - https://betterme.world/privacy-policy 
Subscription Terms - https://betterme.world/subscription-terms

Alma+ app – Zsebedben a gyógyszertárad!

Az Alma+ app az Alma Gyógyszertárak hivatalos mobilalkalmazása, amellyel a gyógyszertár élményét zsebre teheted.
Lépj be a digitális patikádba, és fedezd fel azokat a funkciókat, amelyek megkönnyítik a mindennapokat: kuponkedvezmények, hűségpontok, havi akciók, értesítések és még sok minden más!

Az Alma+ célja, hogy támogasson egészséged megőrzésében, a betegségek megelőzésében és a gyógyulásban, miközben spórolsz a legjobb ajánlatokkal.
Kuponok és akciók – Spórolj minden vásárlásnál!

Az Alma+ applikációval mindig kéznél vannak a legfrissebb kuponok és akciós ajánlatok.
Aktiváld a kuponjaidat egyetlen érintéssel, és élvezd a kihagyhatatlan kedvezményeket kedvenc termékeidre.
Ne maradj le az évszakos akciókról, például az influenza elleni készítményekről, immunerősítőkről vagy bőrápoló termékekről – az app mindig időben szól!

Hűségpontok – Vásárolj, gyűjts, váltsd be!

Csatlakozz az Alma Gyógyszertárak hűségprogramjához, melynek keretében számos patikában gyűjthetsz hűségpontokat országszerte.
Minél többet vásárolsz, annál több pontot kapsz a jogszabály által engedélyezett kategóriájú termékek után, pontjaid beváltásával pedig csökkentheted későbbi vásárlásaid összegét.
Az applikáció automatikusan számolja pontjaidat, így mindig tudod, mennyi található virtuális számládon.
A hűségkedvezmények minden vásárlásodat még kifizetődőbbé teszik – mert az egészséged megérdemli a törődést.


Azonnali kedvezmények és patikakereső

Találd meg pillanatok alatt a legközelebbi Alma Gyógyszertárat, és nézd meg, hol érhetők el az aktuális ajánlatok.
Az appban tájékozódhatsz az akciós termékekről, helyi kedvezményekről, és akár már vásárlásod előtt aktiválhatod a kuponjaidat, hogy biztosan ne maradj le semmiről.
Bárhol is vagy az országban, az Alma+ app mindig segít, hogy a legjobb gyógyszertári ajánlatokat kapd meg. 


Értesítések és személyre szabott ajánlatok

Az Alma+ nem hagyja, hogy lemaradj a számodra fontos dolgokról!
Ha szeretnéd, értesítünk, ha új akciós termék érkezik a kedvenc kategóriádban, ha lejár egy kuponod, vagy ha elérhetővé válik egy rendkívüli ajánlatunk számodra.
A személyre szabott ajánlások segítségével mindig naprakész maradhatsz — akár betegségmegelőzésről vagy egészséges életmódról van szó.

Az Alma+ a megbízható gyógyszertári partnered, ahol szakértői tanácsokat és hiteles információkat találsz – mert az egészség nem játék.
Legyen szó akár gyógyulásról, betegségmegelőzésről vagy öngondoskodásról, az Alma+ mindig segít eligazodni.

Miért válaszd az Alma+ Appot?

- Mert ingyenes, egyszerű és gyors.
- Mert országosan elérhető az Alma Gyógyszertárakban.
- Mert segít spórolni, pontokat gyűjteni és tudatosabban gondoskodni az egészségedről.
- Mert mindig naprakész információkat kapsz a legújabb termékekről, akciókról és patikáink elérhetőségéről
- Mert az Alma+ közösség tagjaként te is részese lehetsz egy országos egészségmegőrző hálózatnak.


Töltsd le most az Alma+ appot, és fedezd fel, mennyivel egyszerűbb, kényelmesebb és olcsóbb az egészségmegőrzés, ha a gyógyszertár mindig ott van a zsebedben!
Maradj egészséges!

A mom ON board a 18 éve működő babamamatudakozo.hu hivatalos alkalmazása. A kismamák és szülők legjobb barátja. Egy mindenre felkészítő, 4D élményalapú várandós alkalmazás a terhességtől a baba első évein át egészen az iskoláskorig.

A mom ON board nem csupán egy terhességi App, alkalmazásunk egy digitális társ, amely végigkísér a szülővé válás minden szakaszán. Hetente követheted a baba fejlődését, figyelheted saját testi-lelki változásaidat, megőrizheted a legfontosabb pillanatokat, amely a legmodernebb 4D technológiával segít végig kísérni a terhességed.

Egy családi tudakozó, amely a terhességtől a baba első 36 hónapján át egészen az iskoláskorig támogatja a kismamákat és szülőket. A mom ON board egy helyen ad edukációs tanácsadást, babafejlődés-követést, valamint kuponokat és kedvezményeket – mindezt országosan, a Klub Kártya elfogadóhelyeinken.

A mom ON board App fő funkciói:

◆ Terhesség hétről hétre: kövesd a baba és az anya testi változásait.
◆ 4D élmény: vizuális 4D betekintés a pocaklakó világába.
◆ Megszületett a babám: digitális képeslap készítése.
◆ Baba fejlődés követés 0–36 hónapos korig: mérföldkövek, szakértői cikkek.
◆ Szakértői tanácsadás: hiteles szakmai tartalmak védőnőktől, orvosoktól, gyógyszerészektől, szakértőktől.
◆ Digitális tudástár: cikkek, tanácsadás minden élethelyzetre.
◆ Klub Kártya: névre szóló digitális kedvezménykártya.
◆ Kedvezmények: országosan Klub Kártya elfogadóhelyeinken.
◆ Kuponok: folyamatosan frissülő akciók és exkluzív meglepetések.
◆ ROSSMANN kuponok: bolti és online egyedi kedvezmények.
◆ Terhességi naptár: vezesd a vizsgálatokat, jegyzetelj és örökítsd meg a legszebb pillanatokat fotóval.
◆ Vizsgálatok: orvosi, védőnői, szülésznői és dúla időpontok figyelése.
◆ Jegyzetek: bevásárlólista, tenivalók, szülési terv és mérföldkövek rögzítése egy helyen.
◆ Check listák: vizsgálatok, kórházi táska, kelengyelista, otthon, ügyintézés, bevásárlólista, utazás, énidő, párkapcsolat, egyedülálló anya.

Kinek ajánljuk a mom ON board alkalmazás letöltését?

◇ Várandós kismama: ha szeretnéd hetente követni a terhességedet.
◇ Szülő: ha szakértői támogatást, kuponokat és kedvezményeket keresel.
◇ Anya: ha hiteles információl kapni a baba fejlődéséről, a fogantatástól egészen az iskoláskorig.
◇ Egyedülálló anya: mert nem vagy egyedül – a mom ON board támogatja, nem ítélkezik, a legnehezebb napokon segít.

RÓLUNK

A mom ON board a 18 éve működő babamamatudakozo.hu hivatalos alkalmazása, amely Magyarország egyik legnagyobb, édesanyákat támogató edukációs platformjára épül. Küldetésünk alapja a hiteles, szakmai tanácsadás az élet legfontosabb és legizgalmasabb időszakában: a gyermekvárástól a baba megszületésén át egészen az iskoláskorig. Célunk, hogy a mom ON board az édesanyák legmegbízhatóbb tanácsadójaként elsősorban információforrásként szolgáljon már a várandósság kezdetétől. Közösségünket több mint 400.000 várandós és gyermekes anyuka alkotja, akik nap mint nap bizalmat, a szakértelmet és az összetartozást keresik, és találják meg bennünk.

FIGYELMEZTETÉS

Az alkalmazásban található információk kizárólagos tájékoztató és oktatási célt szolgálnak, nem helyettesítik a személyre szabott orvosi tanácsadást, diagnózist vagy kezelést. Egészségügyi kérdésekben mindig javasolt szülész-nőgyógyásszal, orvossal vagy védőnővel konzultálni az egyéni egészségi állapot alapján. Az elvégzett vizsgálatok közül több opcionális lehet, vagy csak bizonyos esetekben indokolt, különösen, ha már korábban ismertették őket. Ezek ismétlése kizárólag orvosi javaslat alapján történjen. Az alkalmazásban leírtak nem relevánsak sem diagnózisnak, sem terápiás javaslatnak, és nem minősülnek hivatalos egészségügyi ellátásnak.

ÜGYFÉLSZOLGÁLAT

Folyamatosan azon dolgozunk, hogy javítsuk a mom ON board alkalmazással kapcsolatos élményeket. Van ötleted? Tudasd velünk. Írj egy support@momonboard.com email címet.

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Combining Mi Fitness with smartwatch or smartband devices, users can track their health and fitness data. 

Mi Fitness supported：Xiaomi Watch Series, Redmi Watch Series, Xiaomi Smart Band Series, Redmi Smart Band Series.

Keep track of your workouts
Map your route, monitor your progress, and achieve your goals. Whether it's walking, running, or biking, you can easily track it right from your phone.
Monitor your health information*
Mi Fitness APP assists you in managing your personal health, helping you to always maintain your optimal state. By connecting Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices, important health indicators such as heart rate, sleep, stress, and energy can be monitored and risk warnings generated throughout the day. Health data such as weight and women's health can also be manually recorded and managed.
Sleep better*
In conjunction with Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices that has sleep monitoring functionality, you can record your sleep information every night. By conducting in-depth analysis of the different stages of sleep, including deep sleep, light sleep, and rapid eye movement, as well as monitoring your sleep heart rate, breathing quality, body movements, and other sleep-related data, the device generates a personalized sleep report. This report can help remind you to adjust your sleep habits in a timely manner.
Easy payments with wearable device
Link your Mastercard cards to Mi Fitness and enjoy the convenience of making payments on the go with your wearable device.
Ask Alexa for convenient access
With Alexa, you can easily access important features like checking the weather, playing music, and starting a workout. Just ask and you're good to go.
Stay informed with notifications
Receive notifications, messages, and emails directly on your wearable device, so you can stay informed without having to constantly check your phone.

*Disclaimer
Except for the manual health information recording service provided to users, all other health services within the application only synchronize and record the relevant information of the wristband or watch. All health-related data, results, suggestions, etc. are for reference only and are not intended for medical purposes, including self-diagnosis or consultation with a doctor, and are only used for general fitness and health purposes.
Please note that all smartwatches/fitness trackers currently integrated into the application are not medical devices and cannot provide any form of medical services. In case of any physical discomfort, please seek timely advice from medical institutions.

My Calendar – Period Tracker by Simple Innovation is an elegant and easy-to-use period tracker that helps you take control of the many aspects of your menstrual cycle — from ovulation, fertility and periods, to birth control pills, moods and other symptoms.

Whether you are concerned about conceiving, birth control and contraception, or regularity of period cycles, Period Calendar can help. Our tracker is easy to use and offers everything you need: Track irregular periods, weight, temperature, moods, blood flow, symptoms and more.

- Be CONFIDENT about your HEALTH. Add information to the app, use it to answer your doctor’s questions.
- Note SYMPTOMS, get insights. Use the charts to track changes.
- Track OVULATION and FERTILITY dates. 
- Keep your data SECRET. Use pin-code, face-ID or a fingerprint to keep the data safe.
- Take PILLS on time. Use reminders so you don't miss your pill time.

Discreet reminders keep you informed and prepared by predicting upcoming periods, ovulation, and fertile days. The app adapts to your cycle history and the calculator accurately predicts the important events during your cycle.

Key features:
- Vital info at a glance: intuitive calendar home page lets you visualize non-fertile, fertile, ovulation, expected period and actual period
- Entire cycle log and settings can be backed up and restored easily and quickly. Never be afraid to lose your calendar data, even when you lost your phone or get a new one.
- Detailed tracking: daily planner lets you save essential period information like flow, intercourse, symptoms, moods, temperature, weight, medicine, PMS, other cervical observations, and general diary notes

- Personalize and make it yours: Gorgeous new watercolor themes, adjust period prediction intervals, luteal phase length, plus choose your units of measure and the first day of the week (Sunday or Monday) – all in Settings
- Abstinence mode hides ovulation, fertility and intercourse related data—perfect tracker for girls and teens just starting their periods
- Want to start fresh? Just reset it

INCI Beauty allows you to analyze the composition of cosmetic products simply, quickly, and for free!

Nearly 15,000 different chemical substances can be used in cosmetics. Which are controversial? Which are the most natural? Can some of them have a negative impact on our health or the environment?

Whether you're at home or in a store, INCI Beauty deciphers the contents of your cosmetic products or helps you gain insight before you buy.

INCI Beauty allows you to:

• View the detailed composition of a product by scanning its barcode or searching for it.
• Obtain a rating for each product between 0 and 20.
• Consult detailed information sheets for each cosmetic ingredient and quickly access their regulations worldwide (Europe, Canada, United States, etc.).
• Find a cleaner alternative to products whose rating doesn't satisfy you.
• Browse offers from different online retailers to purchase the product you're looking for.
• Enter restrictions to exclude an unwanted ingredient family.
• Share your opinion with the community using the like/dislike button or by writing a comment.
• Manage your bathroom content.
• Create and share skincare routines with other users.

With your user account (Free), you can:

• Choose an avatar, add a bio, indicate your social network profiles.
• View your search history and manage favorites.
• Add comments and take photos of unknown products.
• Follow and interact with users.

Become a contributor!

Help the INCI Beauty community by entering your own ingredients or those of another user to speed up the analysis of your pending products: https://open.incibeauty.com

How are ratings calculated?

Each component is rated according to its level of hazard or its potentially adverse effects on humans and nature. This is all done using a color code, symbolized by a flower, ranging from green to red. Find all the detailed information on our blog: https://incibeauty.com/theme/19-l-application-inci-beauty

Contact us?

If you have a question, suggestion, or encounter a problem, write to us: contact@incibeauty.com

Our general terms of use: https://incibeauty.com/cgu

developer: Xi'an Monster Software Technology Co., Ltd
description:
Are you a snorer or a sleep talker? Sleep Monitor is your professional sleep companion to help you sleep better and feel more refreshed.
With advanced technology and an easy-to-use interface, the app helps you fall asleep faster, track your sleep cycles, and wake up energized.

Key Features
【Fall Asleep Faster】
Guided breathing exercises help you relax and drift off quickly.
130+ sleep sounds, meditations, and music create a soothing bedtime environment.
【Sleep Talk Recorder】
Capture snoring, talking, coughing, teeth grinding, and more.
Useful information that may indicate sleep issues, such as sleep apnea.
【Track Sleep Cycles】
Understand your stages of sleep: light, deep, and REM.
Get insights into sleep quality and restfulness.
【Bedtime Reminder & Smart Alarm】
Notifications remind you to wind down at night.
Gentle alarms wake you in light sleep for a refreshed morning.
【Detailed Sleep Reports】
View daily, weekly, or monthly analysis of your sleep patterns.
Dream analysis offers insights into self-awareness and personal growth.
【Mark Sleep Factors】
Log habits like caffeine, late meals, or exercise to see how they affect your sleep.
【Apple Health Integration】
Sync with Apple Health for a complete view of your wellness.

Who It’s For
-People with sleep issues: trouble falling asleep, frequent wake-ups, insomnia.
-People curious about their sleep quality or looking for signs of poor sleep.
-Anyone wanting sleep insights without buying a wearable device.

Requirements
√ Place your iPhone near your pillow or bed.
√ Sleep alone for accurate tracking.
√ Ensure enough battery.

Subscription Info
-It will be charged from your iTunes account after the purchase.
-The subscription will be auto-renewed 24 hours before the subscription period ends with the same kind of subscription you already bought at the same price. To avoid automatic renewal, you must cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before it expires.
-You can manage or cancel your auto-renewal subscription by entering the user settings in iTunes after the purchase. It's not possible to cancel the subscription while it's active.
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase the premium subscription.

Medical Disclaimer
The information in this app (including text, graphics, and content) is for general wellness purposes only.
This app does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment and should not be used as a substitute for professional care from a licensed physician or qualified healthcare provider.
- Always consult your physician or healthcare provider about your sleep health, existing conditions, or treatment plans.
- Never ignore or delay seeking professional medical advice because of information from this app.

-Terms of Use: http://sleepmonitor.emobistudio.com/doc/termsofuse.html
-Privacy Policy: https://www.emobistudio.com/SleepMonitor/PrivacyPolicy.html
-Feedback: sleepmonitordev2@gmail.com
